nodes.text: Jellion Broon was a famous male holovid actor decades before the rise of the Galactic Empire. On one occasion, he was acting in a race story that was being shot at the town of Mos Espa on the planet Tatooine. Broon became obsessed with the planet's deserts and wandered off to explore the Jundland Wastes. He reappeared six months later, looking weathered and old, causing the studio to not want to deal with him.
